ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
16 Cameras: 4*Bullet Cameras, 1/3" SONY CCD Camera, 600TV Line, 9~22 mm varifocal lens,  Super Low 0.0 Lux, InfraRed LED 24 Pcs, Projected Distance Up To 196 Feet, Water proof & vandal proof ;; 8*Dome Cameras, 1/3" Effio CCD Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance. Vandalproof. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu.
16 Channel DVR with 4TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, Support CDRW/DVD-RW, 2 USB ports for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprice CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 4TB HDD 960H & D1 Real-Time 30fps Recording Support CDRW/DVD-RW, 16 (4*Bullet & 12*Dome) Vari-Focal Lens Cameras, iPhone Android Viewable
